member.name: T:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrainType
member.summary: Defines the entity type.

member.name: T:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain
member.summary: Defines a heightmap terrain on a map.

member.name: M:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.GetHeight(Engine.MathEx.Vec2,System.Boolean)
member.returns: if hole, Single.MinValue will be returned.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Type
member.summary: Gets the entity type.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Enabled
member.summary: A value indicating whether the object enabled.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Position
member.summary: The position of the terrain on a map.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.HorizontalSize
member.summary: The size of the terrain horizontally.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layers
member.summary: Defines the list of layers.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Collision
member.summary: A value indicating whether the collision detection with the terrain geometry enabled.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.CollisionMaterialName
member.summary: The name of the physical material.
member.remarks: Physical material allows you to configure the behavior of objects in a collision with a terrain. Works only in PhysX. List of materials can be configured in the file \"Base\\Constants\\PhysicsSystem.config\".

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.CollisionHeightfieldThickness
member.summary: The thickness of the physical body of terrain. Only for PhysX.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.CastDynamicShadows
member.summary: Enables a shadow casting by the terrain.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.ReceiveStaticShadows
member.summary: Allows you to apply static shadows in static terrain lighting. Static lighting can be configured using the static lighting manager (Base\StaticLightingManager.type).

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.SimpleRendering
member.summary: The mode to enabled the simplified rendering.
member.remarks: A lot of cost performance effects disable in this mode such as normal mapping, reflections, shadows. This mode is useful for increasing performance. For example, the generation of reflections of water is good to use this mode.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.AmbientOcclusion
member.summary: A group of settings for Ambient Occlusion configuration and calculation.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.LODSettings
member.summary: A group of properties for configuration the level of detail. Levels of detail needed to speed up the rendering of terrain.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.HeightmapSize
member.summary: The parameter indicates the dimension of the terrain. The higher the value, the more detailed the landscape will be.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.MasksSize
member.summary: Specifies the size of cell of map to blending layers. The greater this parameter is, the more quality the blending between layers will be.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.TileSize
member.summary: Number of cells in the one terrain tile (a piece of the landscape).
member.remarks: Tile is a part of the terrain, which is drawn as a single unit in a single draw call. For example, 16x16 - it is 256 cells, which are drawn together. If you see at least one cell of the tile, the engine draws them all. You also have to remember that one tile cannot have more than 5 painting layers. This property is recommended to choose in the process of optimizing performance of the map.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Visible
member.summary: A value indicating whether the the visibility of the terrain enabled.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.AllowVertexTextureFetchOptimization
member.summary: Allows to turn on or turn off a special terrain rendering optimization. This optimization reduces the amount of used memory in several times.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.UseFloat16BitHeightTexture
member.summary: Enables 16-bit float texture format for heights. By default used 32-bit.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.HeightMultiplier
member.summary: Multiplies values of heightmap.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.DetailMapsDistance
member.summary: The distance from the maximum visibility of the detail texture layers from camera.
member.remarks: Option is useful to improve performance, because the small detail is visible only in a short distance, at the time, rendering requires more time.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.RenderQueueGroup
member.summary: Defines rendering order relative to other objects.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.Name
member.summary: Name of the layer.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.BaseMap
member.summary: The path to the base diffuse map.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.BaseScale
member.summary: The stretching of base textures.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.UnloadBaseMapsWhenTerrainUnloaded
member.summary: This parameter allows to enable automatic unloading of the textures when terrain was unloded.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.DetailMap
member.summary: The path to the detail diffuse map.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.DetailScale
member.summary: The stretching of detail map.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.BaseNormalMap
member.summary: The path to the base normal map.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.DetailNormalMap
member.summary: The path to the detail normal map.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.SpecularColor
member.summary: The specular color reflectance properties.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.BaseSpecularMap
member.summary: The path to the base specular map.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.DetailSpecularMap
member.summary: The path to the detail specular map.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.SpecularShininess
member.summary: The shininess of the layer, affecting the size of specular highlights.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.ProjectionAxis
member.summary: This parameter specifies in which axes the texture need to be stretched.
member.remarks: The selected axis defines normal to the plane, in which the texture will be stretched. That is, if you select the axis ZAxis, in this case the texture will be stretched on the X and Y axes. Similarly for Y-X and Z and X-Y and Z. You also must keep in mind that, for example, the texture of the rocks can be located on both the vertical surfaces and horizontal. To avoid this, you can create 2 layers with different ProjectionAxis for this kind of textures.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.Layer.OverrideCollisionMaterial
member.summary: This parameter defines collision material for this layer. Works on PhysX only.
member.remarks: List of material types can be configured in the file "Base\Constants\PhysicsSystem.config".

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.AmbientOcclusionProperties.Enabled
member.summary: A value indicating whether the Ambient Occlusion enabled.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.AmbientOcclusionProperties.Size
member.summary: Defines the size of the texture.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.AmbientOcclusionProperties.RayLength
member.summary: Defines ray length that will be used for the calculation. This setting affects the softness of final result of the calculation.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.AmbientOcclusionProperties.IterationCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of iterations for the calculation. Higher values mean better quality and more time for calculation.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.AmbientOcclusionProperties.Blur
member.summary: Determines whether the texture will be blurred after calculation or not.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.AmbientOcclusionProperties.Power
member.summary: The power of Ambient Occlusion effect.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.LODSettingsProperties.Enabled
member.summary: Enables levels of detail.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.LODSettingsProperties.MaxCount
member.summary: The maximum number of the detail levels.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.LODSettingsProperties.LodLevelDistances
member.summary: The formula for the calculation of detail levels.
member.remarks: Specified as formula. The \"level\" is the number of the detail level. Values are 0, 1, 2, 3, and so on. At the output the switching distance formula gives a certain level to the next.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.LODSettingsProperties.MorphAreaPercent
member.summary: The width of a smooth transition between levels of detail. The default is 0.3, i.e. 30% of the distance between the two levels.

member.name: P:Engine.MapSystem.HeightmapTerrain.LODSettingsProperties.ShowLevels
member.summary: Debug property that enables you to visualize the distribution of levels of detail.

member.summary: Defines the entity type.

member.summary: Gets the entity type.
